title: Art Creation Canvas
description: Assisting user with creating art through UI blocks
summary: The purpose of this canvas is to guide users in creating art by breaking down the process into manageable steps. The canvas provides a checklist for tasks such as gathering art supplies, choosing a medium, and sketching the artwork. Additionally, it offers a curated list of resources including information on art supplies, medium selection, and art inspiration websites to help users throughout their artistic journey.
